languages.text: {n}С каждым словом голос Паскаля звучит все более мощно и царственно.{/n} "Вы видели, что ваш технобрат Тарзус пребывал в агонии. Его буйная вера, распаленная болью, внушала вам страх, но вы молчали. Почтение мешало вам возвысить голос и объявить, что дух машины, с которым он слился разумом, был нездоров".

{n}With each word, Pasqal's voice grows more powerful and majestic:{/n} "You saw the agony your Tech-Brother Tarzus was in. His unbridled, pain-spurred faith intimidated you, yet you were silent. Reverence stopped you from raising your voices to proclaim that the machine spirit with which his mind had merged was morbidly afflicted."
languages.original_text: {n}С каждым словом голос Паскаля звучит все более мощно и царственно.{/n} "Вы видели, что ваш технобрат Тарзус пребывал в агонии. Его буйная вера, распаленная болью, внушала вам страх, но вы молчали. Почтение мешало вам возвысить голос и объявить, что дух машины, с которым он слился разумом, был нездоров".

His unbridled, pain-spurred faith intimidated you, yet you were silent. Reverence stopped you from raising your voices to proclaim that the machine spirit with which his mind had merged was morbidly afflicted."

languages.text: {n}それぞれの言葉とともに、パスカルの声はより力強く堂々としたものになった。{/n}「あなたは技術同胞ターザスを苛んでいた苦痛を見た。拘束から解放され、痛みに拍車がかかった彼の信念があなたを脅したが、あなたは沈黙していた。崇敬があなたに声をあげて彼の精神が融合した機械精霊は病に苦しんでいたと宣言することをやめさせた」
languages.original_text: {n}With each word, Pasqal's voice grows more powerful and majestic:{/n} "You saw the agony your Tech-Brother Tarzus was in. His unbridled, pain-spurred faith intimidated you, yet you were silent. Reverence stopped you from raising your voices to proclaim that the machine spirit with which his mind had merged was morbidly afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}それぞれの言葉とともに、パスカルの声はより力強く堂々としたものになった。{/n}「あなたは技術同胞ターザスを苛んでいた苦痛を見た。拘束から解放され、痛みに拍車がかかった彼の信念があなたを脅したが、あなたは沈黙していた。崇敬があなたに声をあげて彼の精神が融合した機械精霊は病に苦しんでいたと宣言することをやめさせた」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡每说出一个字，他的声音就变得更加有力，更加充满威严。{/n}“你已经看到了你的技术兄弟塔祖斯身处怎样的痛苦之中。他的信仰受到痛苦的驱使，变得肆无忌惮，已经对你构成了威胁，而你却始终保持沉默。出于敬意，你并没有向所有人高声宣布他的心灵与机魂发生了故障。”
languages.original_text: {n}With each word, Pasqal's voice grows more powerful and majestic:{/n} "You saw the agony your Tech-Brother Tarzus was in. His unbridled, pain-spurred faith intimidated you, yet you were silent. Reverence stopped you from raising your voices to proclaim that the machine spirit with which his mind had merged was morbidly afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡每说出一个字，他的声音就变得更加有力，更加充满威严。{/n}“你已经看到了你的技术兄弟塔祖斯身处怎样的痛苦之中。他的信仰受到痛苦的驱使，变得肆无忌惮，已经对你构成了威胁，而你却始终保持沉默。出于敬意，你并没有向所有人高声宣布他的心灵与机魂发生了故障。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit jedem Wort wird Pasqals Stimme kräftiger und majestätischer.{/n} "Ihr habt die Qual gesehen, in der sich Euer Tech-Bruder Tarzus befand. Sein ungebrochener, vom Schmerz beflügelter Glaube hat Euch eingeschüchtert, dennoch habt Ihr geschwiegen. Ehrfurcht hat verhindert, dass Ihr Eure Stimmen erhoben und verkündet habt, dass der Maschinengeist, mit dem sein Geist verschmolzen war, auf morbide Weise beeinflusst war."
languages.original_text: {n}With each word, Pasqal's voice grows more powerful and majestic:{/n} "You saw the agony your Tech-Brother Tarzus was in. His unbridled, pain-spurred faith intimidated you, yet you were silent. Reverence stopped you from raising your voices to proclaim that the machine spirit with which his mind had merged was morbidly afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit jedem Wort wird Pasqals Stimme kräftiger und majestätischer.{/n} "Ihr habt die Qual gesehen, in der sich Euer Tech-Bruder Tarzus befand. Sein ungebrochener, vom Schmerz beflügelter Glaube hat Euch eingeschüchtert, dennoch habt Ihr geschwiegen. Ehrfurcht hat verhindert, dass Ihr Eure Stimmen erhoben und verkündet habt, dass der Maschinengeist, mit dem sein Geist verschmolzen war, auf morbide Weise beeinflusst war."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}À chaque mot, la voix de Pasqal se fait plus puissante et majestueuse.{/n} « Vous avez vu les affres dont souffrait votre technofrère Tarzus. Sa foi débridée, aiguillonnée par la douleur, vous faisait craindre le pire, et pourtant, vous n'avez pas bronché. Votre révérence excessive vous a empêché d'élever la voix pour proclamer la vérité, à savoir que l'esprit de la machine avec lequel il avait fusionné était atteint d'un mal incurable. »
languages.original_text: {n}With each word, Pasqal's voice grows more powerful and majestic:{/n} "You saw the agony your Tech-Brother Tarzus was in. His unbridled, pain-spurred faith intimidated you, yet you were silent. Reverence stopped you from raising your voices to proclaim that the machine spirit with which his mind had merged was morbidly afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}À chaque mot, la voix de Pasqal se fait plus puissante et majestueuse.{/n} « Vous avez vu les affres dont souffrait votre technofrère Tarzus. Sa foi débridée, aiguillonnée par la douleur, vous faisait craindre le pire, et pourtant, vous n'avez pas bronché. Votre révérence excessive vous a empêché d'élever la voix pour proclamer la vérité, à savoir que l'esprit de la machine avec lequel il avait fusionné était atteint d'un mal incurable. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de Pasqal adquiere más potencia y majestuosidad con cada palabra.{/n} «Ya habéis visto la agonía que atenazaba a vuestro tecnohermano Tarzus. Su fe desatada, azuzada por el dolor, os intimidó, pero guardasteis silencio. La reverencia os ha impedido alzar la voz para proclamar que el espíritu máquina con el que su mente se había fusionado adolecía de una mórbida afección».
languages.original_text: {n}With each word, Pasqal's voice grows more powerful and majestic:{/n} "You saw the agony your Tech-Brother Tarzus was in. His unbridled, pain-spurred faith intimidated you, yet you were silent. Reverence stopped you from raising your voices to proclaim that the machine spirit with which his mind had merged was morbidly afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Pasqal adquiere más potencia y majestuosidad con cada palabra.{/n} «Ya habéis visto la agonía que atenazaba a vuestro tecnohermano Tarzus. Su fe desatada, azuzada por el dolor, os intimidó, pero guardasteis silencio. La reverencia os ha impedido alzar la voz para proclamar que el espíritu máquina con el que su mente se había fusionado adolecía de una mórbida afección».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi, her kelimeyle daha da güçlü ve görkemli çıkıyor.{/n} "Tekno Kardeş Tarzus'un yaşadığı ızdıraba şahit oldun. Onun gem vurulmamış, acıyla mahmuzlanmış inancı gözünü korkuttu ancak yine de sessiz kaldın. Duyduğun saygı, sesini yükseltmene ve zihniyle birleşmiş olan makine ruhunun hasta olduğunu beyan etmene engel oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}With each word, Pasqal's voice grows more powerful and majestic:{/n} "You saw the agony your Tech-Brother Tarzus was in. His unbridled, pain-spurred faith intimidated you, yet you were silent. Reverence stopped you from raising your voices to proclaim that the machine spirit with which his mind had merged was morbidly afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi her kelimeyle daha da güçlü ve görkemli bir hâl alıyor:{/n} "Tekno Kardeş'in Tarzus'un yaşadığı ızdıraba şahit oldun. Onun gem vurulmamış, acıyla mahmuzlanmış inancı senin gözünü korkuttu ancak yine de sessiz kaldın. Duyduğun saygı, sesini yükseltmene ve zihniyle birleşmiş olan makine ruhunun hasta olduğunu beyan etmene engel oldu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
